item.description:
Let's rally our Meetup troops to show Dr. Paul a warm and supportive welcome to the GOP BBQ and show all those attending that the Ron Paul campaign is made up of enthusiastic supporters.

An hour prior to the GOP BBQ, we will meet to line Route 111 (West Hollis St.) with Ron Paul supporters holding campaign signs and Revolution Banners. Route 111 (at Exit 5 off Rt. 3, Everett Turnpike), leads to the GOP event.

Bring signs if you have them, but don't worry if you don't have signs or banners. The Nashua Meetup Group will supply 35, 3 x 9 foot banners that we've made for this purpose. We have more events planned with these banners, so be sure to return them after the event.

Meetup Location...
Take exit 5W off the Everett Turnike (Rte. 3). We will plan to meet at the little island in front of the Police Station across from the Greek Church.

For parking...
Take a right at the light at the end of the exit ramp onto 111. Then take your first right onto the little street where you see the sign that says "no thru traffic". Then take a fast right onto the street that runs along the cemetary parimeter. Park there.
item.name: Pre BBQ Banner Blitz and Sign Wave
